arts.ttl: Hamburg’s Yussuf Poulsen thanks RB Leipzig fans for ‘special’ homecoming tributes
arts.sum: New Hamburg captain Yussuf Poulsen made sure to thank the RB Leipzig fans for a stirring pre-match choreo tribute to mark his return to Saxony.

arts.ttl: Confirmed lineups: RB Leipzig vs. Hamburger SV
arts.sum: Here are the official starting XIs for the Bundesliga clash between RB Leipzig and HSV.

arts.ttl: Hamburg head coach declares Yussuf Poulsen ready for minutes ahead of reunion with RB Leipzig
arts.sum: Hamburg head coach Merlin Polzin has declared squad captain Yussuf Poulsen ready for minutes ahead of a reunion with his old club RB Leipzig this weekend.

arts.ttl: RB Leipzig vs. Hamburger SV preview: Hosts looking to extend unbeaten streak
arts.sum: RB Leipzig will be looking to extend their five-game unbeaten run when they welcome Hamburger SV to the Red Bull Arena.

arts.ttl: RB Leipzig vs Hamburger SV - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between RB Leipzig and Hamburger SV, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
